name: bsidestarchild
text: Todd's middle finger is classic.

name: abe
text: He nods his head in solemn reverence toward his bird.

name: phthano
text: That's my new avatar. For sure.

name: scorpio_nadir
text:
Todd looks just like the two protesting sprinters at the 1968 Mexico Olympics. "Fuck you, World."
Tommie Smith, John Carlos.
[IMGS OFF]

name: scorpio_nadir
text:
and fuck you bbcode, for not showing the jpg.

[IMGS OFF]

name: greenkoolayd
text: A comment left by greenkoolayd was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by riotdejaneiro, Mangtastic, philophobe, mashisoyo, AmonRunsAmok)

name: overmedicated
text: You don't understand much do you Green.

name: madnes
text: I like to critique musicians by heckling, "What do you think this is, the Pet Shop Boys?"

name: i_love_kate
text: The Pet Shop Boys take it the hardest.

name: madnes
text: For the Pet Shop Boys, I use "What do you think this is, Bros? "

name: fuckyoufriday
text: Lyle really has heard better music blown through pantyhose. In Tijuana.

name: tasteful
text: lyle, blown through pantyhose, has heard better music

name: fuckyoufriday
text: tasteful.

name: never_die
text: How a drug addict can even poorly render the nuances of the saxohone amazes me.

name: spectre
text: Yeah, usually junkies play the trumpet. (See: the entire history of Jazz.)

name: thatcrazycommie
text: Uh, Charlie Parker?

name: i_love_kate
text: What a bizarre comment to make. When has heavy drug addiction ever had anything more than a positive influence on artistic ability?

name: farqussus
text: Saxophone is the exception. It is best served by being slightly tipsy on white wine spritzer.

name: straw
text: So, I take it you do not like John Coltrane/music.

name: philophobe
text: Blah blah blah obligatory Bill Hicks reference blah blah.

name: deancain29
text: Lyle's A-game is present and correct once again - c'mon on guys, try to keep up.

name: f1shst1ck
text: i like his little saxophone

name: tetrisattack
text: Is that a P-bass?

name: philosophe
text: Nope. Just a generic bass.

name: andrew_
text: it reminds me of a musicman stingray.

name: philosophe
text: Could be, and I see what you're saying, but the cutaways on that bass are equal, the Stingray has an offset J-Bass style body.

name: lux
text: I'm imagining this calm and normal conversation in screaming Philippe voices thanks to your avatars.

name: tetrisattack
text:
I agree. That's what I meant to say but I couldn't remember what type of bass.
It looks JUST like a Stingray.

name: ovenface
text: no, it's a sea bass.

name: spectre
text: Alt text: "April, Come she will September Todd will fuck up with his saxophone"

name: honesttom
text: That was the funniest part of this strip for me. I'm imagining Art Garfunkel suggesting it, and Paul Simon saying, "No, no, that doesn't work at all!"

name: thesyndicate88
text: An April Come She Will reference?! AHH! *splut*

name: seph
text: The present-day Todd would shank a bitch with prejudice.

name: paby
text: I don't get the pantyhose reference at all.

name: ssddr
text: Pantyhose covers butts->Farts come out of butts->Fart joke.

name: paby
text: OH I see.

name: mattfish
text: Lyle has heard women's farts that sound better than Todd's playing.

name: mopeydroney
text: Deh East End Boys N West End Goils!

name: private_public
text: Todd is a squirrel of many talents. Much like an onion, you peel back the layers to find and more things. Saxophone, van, I wonder what else he does?

name: philophobe
text: Seems like he does just about anything that moves, and probably plenty of things that don't.
